verses.name: Jeremiah 2:20
verses.text: For of old time I have broken thy yoke, and burst thy bands; and thou saidst, I will not transgress; when upon every high hill and under every green tree thou wanderest, playing the harlot.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:21
verses.text: Yet I had planted thee a noble vine, wholly a right seed: how then art thou turned into the degenerate plant of a strange vine unto me?

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:22
verses.text: For though thou wash thee with nitre, and take thee much soap, yet thine iniquity is marked before me, saith the Lord God.
